ygData.subject: Use case of mapping a WSDL-based interface into a RESTFul HTTP
ygData.msgSnippet: Dear all, in our working context (Grid Computing), we performed an exercise of mapping a WS-based interface for job submission and management into a RESTFul

Subject: Use case of mapping a WSDL-based interface into a RESTFul HTTP
X-Yahoo-Group-Post: member; u=205600314

Dear all,

in our working context (Grid Computing), we performed an exercise of 
mapping a WS-based interface for job submission and management into a 
RESTFul HTTP approach.

We wrote a technical report on the mapping process and the decisions 
that we made. We are interested in your feedback:
http://www.lnf.infn.it/sis/preprint/detail.php?id=5111


Thanks, Sergio



--
